directions: In a saucepan, saute onion and garlic in olive oil over medium heat.  Make sure it doesn't burn.  Add tomatoes,  basil, sugar, oregano, salt and pepper.  Bring to boil and continue to boil 5 minutes or until most of the liquid evaporates.  Remove from heat; stir in whipping cream and butter.  Reduce heat and simmer 5 more minutes.
ingredients: 1 (14.5 ounce) can Italian-style diced tomatoes, undrained
title: Tomato-Cream Sauce for Pasta
